channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Manchester Airport: MP demands perpetrators in stamping row should face 'full force of the law'
item.description: Following the emergence of the latest VIRAL footage taken at Manchester Airport, Rochdale MP Paul Waugh said both sides to last week's violent incident are "shocking"

item.title: Sharks ‘high on cocaine’ after drugs are being flushed down the loo
item.description: It could be affecting their behaviour making them more aggressive.

item.title: Man explores town abandoned overnight by 20,000 residents – and is left 'heartbroken'
item.description: The Italian village of Fossa was evacuated in April 2009 after a massive earthquake raised fears that the entire mountainside could collapse, and it has been left abandoned ever since

item.title: Drivers of certain vehicles to be hit with new car tax charges in months
item.description: Vehicle Excise Duty rates will apply to electric car owners from April in a major blow, with certain models hit hardest by the changes. The DVLA insists this new charge is about fairness

item.title: 'Divine' £99 Marc Jacobs perfume now less than half price at Superdrug
item.description: Marc Jacob's Honey perfume is now only £32 at Superdrug, saving shoppers almost £70 as shoppers urged to 'run to stores' for the bargain deal

item.title: 'Entitled neighbour demands I babysit her kids this summer – she wants a break'
item.description: A woman has been praised for putting her 'entitled' neighbour in her place after she ordered her to babysit her two children throughout the summer holidays while she works from home and relaxes
